resources.string: La Pocha, also known as La Podrida or Oh Hell, is a very widespread game in different Spanish-speaking countries, and this contributes to a very high number of variants. It is a game of tricks in which the important thing is not to obtain more or less tricks, but to guess in advance how many will be won.
